Cards.Heading: how it works
Cards.body-1: Grab your phone and take a clean shot of your product. Make sure there is good lighting natural light near a window works great. The clearer the photo, the better your final result will look. No fancy camera needed
Cards.body-2: Upload the photo straight to our site. No editing, no setup  just a simple upload, and you're good to go. our AI will handle the rest from here.
Cards.body-3: Once your image is uploaded, our AI takes over  generating a polished background, engaging captions, and everything you need to create a high-quality, ready-to-post asset in seconds
